name: Titan Strength
description: Strike a target, dealing maximum damage instead of rolling. If the target is left Unguarded, push them back 20 feet.

name: Shrug Off
description: Use this immediately as you would take damage. Reduce the triggering damage taken by d12.

name: Sweeping Blow
description:
Strike each target in a 30-foot cone originating from you with your tail.
Any targets left Unguarded are knocked 10 feet away from you or Prone (choose).

name: Bull Rush
description:
Move up to your speed in a straight line and strike a target with your horns. If the target is left Unguarded they begin Bleeding.
This skill can be used multiple times per scene.

name: Unstoppable
description: Until the end of your next turn you are immune to all damage and any status that would reduce your movement. During this time you can move once per turn without spending an action.

name: Storm of Blades
description: Strike each creature of your choice within a 15-foot radius 20-foot tall cylinder centered on you twice.

name: Flaming Retort
description: Use when damaged by a creature you can see within range. Deal 2d8 Fire damage to the triggering creature.

name: Flame Slash
description:
Send an arc of flaming energy from your weapon, dealing 2d6 Fire damage to each creature in a 5-foot wide 30-foot long line.
Any targets left Unwarded begin Burning.

name: Reconstitute
description: Restore Guard up to your maximum.

name: Paralytic Strike
description:
Growing venomous fangs you bite down on a creature, dealing 2d6 Poison damage.
If the target is left Unwarded they fall Asleep.

name: Phoenix Dive
description:
Leap into the sky and strike down on a point you can see within range. Deal 2d10 Fire damage to each creature within a 15-foot radius of the point.
Fully restore your Guard, Ward, and Health.

name: Fissure
description:
A fissure forms in a 5-foot wide 60-foot long line. Each creature in the area takes 2d8 Earth damage.
Any creatures left Unguarded fall Prone.

name: Hunter's Prey
description:
Mark a creature for 1 minute. While marked, you deal an additional d4 damage to the creature.
Once the marked creature is slain, reclaim this skill.

name: Ensnaring Strike
description: Strike a creature. That creature cannot move until the start of your next turn.

name: Swiftstrike
description: Move and then Strike a creature.

name: Bouncing Blade
description:
Throw a dagger that bounces between two creatures you can see within range, dealing 2d6 damage to each of them.
Any creatures left Unguarded begin Bleeding.

name: Ballistic Blow
description: Deal twice your weapon damage to each creature of your choice in a 120-foot long 15-foot wide line originating from you.

name: Fan of Daggers
description:
Strike each target of your choice in a 60-foot cone. These Strikes deal an extra d6 damage.
Any creatures left Unguarded begin Bleeding.

name: Arctic Blade
description:
Throw a shuriken that deals 1d8 Water damage to up to three creatures you can see within range.
Any creatures left Unwarded are Chilled.

name: Crescent Strike
description:
Deal 2d6 Water damage to each creature in 15-foot semi-circle centered on you.
Any creatures left Unwarded are Chilled.

name: Uncanny Agility
description: For 1 minute, if a creature attempts to strike you roll 1d6, on a 3 or higher you are unaffected.

name: Detonate
description: Use this skill as you slay a creature with a melee attack. Deal 2d6 Air damage to each creature other than yourself within a 15-foot radius of the triggering creature.

name: Deepwalk
description: You become invisible until the end of your next turn. While you are invisible your Strikes and Skills deal an additional d4 Piercing damage.

name: Tesletic Burst
description:
Deal 3d8 Air damage to each creature in a 20-foot radius around you.
Any creatures left Unwarded are Shocked.
You are immune to Air damage until the end of your next turn,

name: Pyrochannel
description: The next Fire skill you use does maximum damage.

name: Phoenix Feathers
description:
Use as both your gd and wd become depleted. Deal 2d6 Fire damage to each creature within a 30-foot radius of you.
Any targets left Unwarded begin Burning

name: Petrify
description:
Deal 2d4 Earth damage to target creature.
If the target is left Unwarded they become Petrified.

name: Venomstitch
description: Deal 2d6 damage to yourself and up to one creature you can see within range.

name: Hypernova
description:
Deal 3d8 Fire damage to each creature within a 30-foot sphere centered on a point you can see within range.
Any creatures left Unwarded begin Burning.

name: Cataclysm
description:
Deal 3d4 Earth damage to each creature of your choice within a 60-foot radius.
Any creatures left Unguarded fall Prone.

name: Moonbless
description: Until your next turn, target creature’s Strikes and Skills deal +d4 Water damage.

name: Flash Freeze
description:
Deal 1d6 Water damage to target creature you can see within range.
A target left Unwarded is Frozen.

name: Twinbolt
description:
Deal 2d8 Air damage to two targets you can see within range.
Any targets left Unwarded are Shocked.

name: Storm's Wrath
description: Use as you are hit by a melee attack. Deal 2d10 Air damage to the triggering creature.

name: Cleansing Wave
description: Healing water flows into a 30-foot radius, making all creatures wet. Heal any number of creatures in the area 2d10 and remove Burning, Impaired, Decaying, Poisoned, Chilled, and Shocked.

name: Chain Lightning
description:
A bolt of lightning strikes a creature you can see within range and forks to up to 5 creatures of your choice within a 30-foot radius of it. Each target takes 3d8 Air damage.
Any targets left Unwarded are Stunned.

name: Humongify
description: Until the end of the scene you double in size and your strikes deal +d4 damage.

name: Crippling Blow
description:
Strike a target.
A target left Unguarded is Maimed.

name: Rage
description: Until the end of your turn, roll double dice for all your Strikes.

name: Draconic Roar
description: You let out a terrifying roar, dealing 3d8 Physical damage to any number of  creature who can hear you in a 30-foot radius.

name: Supreme Sneak
description: Use while out of view of your enemies, become invisible until your next turn or until you affect another creature.

name: Hemorrhage
description: Strike a creature who is Bleeding. Deal 2d6 Piercing damage to them and they stop Bleeding.

name: Knock Out Punch
description:
Pummel a creature with your offhand or an otherwise free limb, dealing d8 Physical damage.
A target left Unguarded is knocked Prone.

name: Razorwind
description:
Send forth a torrent of eviscerating winds in a 60-foot long, 15-foot wide line, dealing 3d6 Physical damage.
Any targets left Unguarded begin Bleeding.

name: Radiance
description: Until the end of the scene you glow with burning light and your weapons and skills deal an additional 2 Fire damage.

name: Earthborne Strike
description: Strike a target, you then gain Guard equal to the damage dealt.

name: Flaming Frenzy
description:
Ruthlessly strike a creature with your claws, dealing 2d6+d4 Fire damage.
A target left Unwarded begins Burning.

name: Flame Breath
description:
Breath fire into a 60-foot cone originating from you, dealing 3d6 Fire damage to each creature in the area.
Any targets left Unwarded begin Burning.

name: Slippery Escape
description: As a body of murky waters you slip out of any physical restraints and move up to your speed, ignoring any statuses affecting you.

name: Lash Out
description: Strike up to eight creatures with the your tentacles.

name: Tailwind
description: Until end of combat, any allies who start their turn within 30 feet of you or enter that area during their turn have their movement increased by 10 feet for that turn.

name: Winter Breath
description:
Breath frigid air into a 60-foot cone originating from you, dealing 3d6 Water damage to each creature in the area.
Any targets left Unwarded are Chilled.

name: Whirlwind Strike
description: Spinning your equipped weapon(s) around you, you strike any number of creatures within within your weapon’s reach.

name: Battle Slam
description:
Slamming your weapon(s) into the ground you send a shockwave in a 15-foot cone originating from you. Strike each creature in the area.
Any targets left Unguarded are knocked Prone.

name: Aegis Toss
description: Throwing your equipped shield, it bounces off of up to two targets you can see within range  standing no more than 30 feet apart, and then returns to your hand. Deal 2d4 Physical damage to each target.

name: Blitz
description: Leap towards a target you can see within range and Strike it. Then you may leap towards a second target within 10 feet. of the first and Strike it as well.

name: War Chant
description: You let out a resounding cry that bolsters you and your allies. Any creatures of your choice that can hear you deal +2 damage and reduce all damage they take by 1 until the end of the combat.

name: Steely Resolve
description: Your blood turns quicksilver and your skin coated in steel. You gain 2d6 gd now and an additional d6 Guard at the start of the next 2 rounds.

name: Tentacle Strike
description:
One of your limbs turns into a tentacle you use to lash out at a target you can see within range, dealing 2d8 Physical damage.
A target left Unguarded is Atrophied.

name: Bouncing Shot
description: Strike a target. Your ammunition then bounces up to two additional targets, each target no more than 15 feet from the last.

name: Full Bore
description: Fire a piece of ammunition in a 5-foot wide, 60-foot long line. Strike each target in the line, dealing Piercing damage rather than your weapon’s normal damage.

name: Pinning Shot
description:
Strike a target, dealing +d4 damage.
A target left Unguarded is Maimed.

name: Swiftstep
description: In a wisp of smoke you teleport to a point you can see within range.

name: Rake
description:
Strike a creature, dealing Piercing damage rather than your weapon’s normal damage type.
If the target is Unguarded, the begin Bleeding.

name: Degenerating Strike
description:
Strike a target with an attack infused with corrupting toxins, dealing an +d6 damage.
A target left Unguarded is Impaired and begins Decaying.

name: Disarming Strike
description:
Strike a target.
A target left Unguarded is Atrophied.

name: Fireball
description:
Launch a fiery missile towards a point you can see within range where it errupts into a 15-foot sphere. Each creature in the area takes 2d6 Fire damage.
Any target left Unwarded begins Burning.

name: Solar Flare
description:
With a word, flames erupt around you. Each creature within a 15-foot radius takes d6 Fire damage.
Any target left Unwarded begins Burning.

name: Flame Lash
description:
Conjure a whip of fire and strike a creature with it for 3d6 Fire damage.
A target left Unwarded is Blinded and begins Burning.

name: Blazing Salvo
description:
Launch a mass of molten earth at a point you can see within range, where it explodes into a 5-foot sphere, leaving burning earth in its wake. Deal d10 Fire and d6 Earth damage to each creature in the area.
Any targets left Unwarded begins Burning.

name: Fortify
description:
Loose stones form armor around target creature you can see within range. The target gains 2d6 gd.
Removes Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, and Decaying.

name: Stalagmite Strike
description:
Sharp stones jettison from the ground at a point you can see within range in a 10-foot circle. Deal 2d6 Earth damage to each creature in the area.
Any targets left Unguarded are Maimed.

name: Corroding Touch
description: Grabbing a creature, you coat them in corrosive acid, reducing their gd by 2d6 now and d6 at the begining of the next round.

name: Restoration
description:
Soothing waters wash over target creature you can see within range, restoring d10 hp now and d10 more at the start of the next round.
Removes Bleeding, Poisoned, and Burning.

name: Rain
description:
Rain pours down into a 30-foot radius 60-foot tall cylinder centered on a point you can see within range for 2 rounds or until dispered by strong winds.
Any target that starts its turn in or enters the area becomes Wet.

name: Mantle of Frost
description:
Icy armor forms around target creature you can see within range. The target gains 2d6 wd.
Removes Burning, Frozen, Poisoned, Petrified, Shocked and Stunned.

name: Icicle Fan
description:
Launch 3 shards of ice at points you can see within range where they explode and deal d6 Water damage to each creature in a 5-foot sphere.
Any target left Unwarded begins Chilled.

name: Eddy Warp
description: With a gust of magical wind you teleport a creature you can see within range to another point you can see within range.

name: Lightning Strike
description:
Send a bolt of lightning into a 100-foot long 5-foot wide line, dealing 2d6 Air damage to each creature in its path.
Any target left Unwarded is Shocked.

name: Dazzling Bolt
description:
An orb of technicolor energy emanates from a point you can see within range into a 10-foot sphere. Deal 2d8 Air damage to each creature in the area.
Any target left Unwarded is Shocked.
